author: bencomic

left.text: if anyone at pi*e cobble school is reading this, please, please, i'm going to kill you

panels.narration: <Nadir> i can imagine him and that guy he jerked off with busting into the school with guns, and yelling:

right.text: BRINGING YOU... YOUR DEATHS! REIN RAUS, FUCKERS!

panels.narration: <MadTom> he gets distracted in the cafeteria, though.

right.text: i mean, when will the snack machines EVER be effectively free again?

title: THE P*NE COBBLE SCHOOL MASSACRE - PART 2
